ThingDef.label: tusk pot
ThingDef.description: Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.

ThingDef.label: plant pot
ThingDef.description: A plant pot that can hold decorative flowers to improve the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.label: long plant pot
ThingDef.description: A plant pot that can hold decorative flowers to improve the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.label: penta plant pot
ThingDef.description: Roses are red, violets are blue, we love our Penta Pot, and so will you!

ThingDef.label: pallet
ThingDef.description: The pallet will allow various bulk resources, such as metal and wood, to be stacked much denser than the ground would otherwise allow. Has 1000 items + 1 stack storage capacity.

ThingDef.label: skip
ThingDef.description: Skips are heavy-duty, industrial grade storage devices, allowing bulk resources such as metal and wood to be stacked denser, even denser than the pallet. Has 1500 items + 1 stack storage capacity.

ThingDef.label: pot
ThingDef.description: A big pot made of wood, metal or ceramics; used to preserve food. Slows rotting process. Up to 6 items.

ThingDef.label: basket
ThingDef.description: A basket made of leather or textile. Used to store various things inside. Up to 6 items.

ThingDef.label: barrel
ThingDef.description: A barrel made of wood or metal. Used to store various things inside. Up to 6 items.

ThingDef.label: chest
ThingDef.description: A simple chest. Used to store various things inside. Up to 6 items.

ThingDef.label: armored chest
ThingDef.description: An armored chest made of metal. Used to store various things inside. Up to 6 items.

ThingDef.label: shelf
ThingDef.description: This shelf stores textiles, leathers and raw textile ingridients. Up to 8 items.

ThingDef.label: fridge
ThingDef.description: Stores food. Up to 7 items. Slows rotting process. This track rack requires power in order to keep food refrigerated.

ThingDef.label: serving table
ThingDef.description: A small table that is used for storing all kinds of meals. Up to 6 items. Decrease rotting process.

ThingDef.label: medicine cabinet
ThingDef.description: Stores medicine and raw medical ingridients; prevents deterioration. Up to 7 items. Decrease rotting process.

ThingDef.label: ammo box
ThingDef.description: Stores ammos; prevents deterioration. Up to 8 items.

ThingDef.label: armored ammo box
ThingDef.description: Stores ammos; prevents deterioration. Up to 8 items.

ThingDef.label: Armory
ThingDef.description: Stores a lot of weapons; prevents deterioration. Up to 15 items.

ThingDef.label: armored box
ThingDef.description: Stores weapons, weapon parts, weapon crates, ammo and apparel; prevents deterioration. Up to 8 items.

ThingDef.label: commode
ThingDef.description: A place for colonist to store personal belongings. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly. Up to 8 items.

ThingDef.label: apparel cupboard
ThingDef.description: Stores a lot of apparel; prevents deterioration. Up to 15 items.

ThingDef.label: standinglLamp (white)
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that lights an area. Requires 80 W.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (red)
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in a red glow. Requires 80 W.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (green)
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in a green glow. Requires 80 W.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (blue)
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in blue glow. Requires 80 W.

ThingDef.label: floor lamp
ThingDef.description: People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 80 W.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp
ThingDef.description: A ceiling lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Must be placed under a roof. Requires 80 W.

ThingDef.label: torch lamp
ThingDef.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be refueled. Produces a small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: bowl lamp
ThingDef.description: A bright and warm little fire, perfectly contained in a bowl. People need light to move and work at full speed.

ThingDef.label: wall torch
ThingDef.description: A wall mounted torch for lighting an area. Can be refueled. Not a good source of heat. Must be placed on a wall. People need light to move and work at full speed.

ThingDef.label: candle
ThingDef.description: People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be refueled. Not a good source of heat.

ThingDef.label: glowstone lamp
ThingDef.description: A beautiful lamp topped with glowstone, emitting reflected light from dozen of glowstones. People need light to move and work at full speed. Free source of light.

ThingDef.label: outdoor lamp
ThingDef.description: A small ground lamp that is powered by the sun. People need light to move and work at full speed. It lights a small area outdoors.

ThingDef.label: path light
ThingDef.description: Small light with built in solar panel that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.

ThingDef.label: wall lamp
ThingDef.description: A lamp that must be placed against a supporting wall. People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 80 W. It has a bigger glow than most lights.

ThingDef.label: wall light
ThingDef.description: A small light that must be placed on a supporting wall. People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 70 W.

ThingDef.label: square floor light (white)
ThingDef.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a white lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.

ThingDef.label: square floor light (red)
ThingDef.description: A square floor light integraded into the ground with a red lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.

ThingDef.label: square floor light (green)
ThingDef.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a green lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.

ThingDef.label: square floor light (blue)
ThingDef.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a blue lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.

ThingDef.label: Zone marker
ThingDef.description: Simple slab of steel with some paint on it.
